post_title: All aboard to the mountain train
post_content:
View this post on Instagram

#cascadetrain #durangocolorado

A post shared by Micky Carr (@micky.carr) on Dec 26, 2016 at 6:30pm PST

Witness the spectacular sunlight bouncing on the Cascades ranges. The train trip originates from Eugene, Oregon, and runs parallel to the Cascade mountain range, all the way through Portland, Seattle, and finally, Vancouver.
sub_category: Rediscover the Country with These 15 Scenic Train Trips
sub_category_description:
Explore the breathtaking landscapes and terrain of the US with these luxurious train trips across the country and you will never book an air ticket again!

Our country is riddled with landscapes and valleys that look like a painting come to life. The best way to rendezvous and appreciate its natural beauty is to travel. And what better way to explore the country than traveling in an old-timey, dreamy railway journey. However, since our travel plans are put on hold indefinitely, we might have to wait until we can journey through the vastness of beauty in the country. In the meantime, take a look at these 15 train trips you can plan in the future.

post_content:
View this post on Instagram

Coastin’ #PacificSurfliner 📸 by @dtrr_photography

A post shared by Pacific Surfliner (@pacificsurfliner) on Sep 13, 2019 at 9:09am PDT

The Pacific Surfliner is one of the most pocket and budget-friendly train trips you can board. It journeys along the Southern California coastline, stopping at small cities and towns, making the three-hour journey a treat to the eyes.

post_title: From tall skylines to the land of maple
post_content:
View this post on Instagram

Some #trainviews from the northbound #Amtrak #AdirondackTrain today. I’m reflecting on these beautiful scenes in memory of Jim and Zack. #traintravel

A post shared by Malcolm Kenton (@ferrocastor) on Dec 19, 2017 at 4:28pm PST

For less than $100, the Adirondack train takes 11 hours from the hustling-bustling New York City to the land of the Maple leaf, Montreal, Canada. It takes you through the most beautiful trails of the United States.

View this post on Instagram

If you miss the train I'm on, you will know that I am gone .... The Amtrak Sunset Limited between Van Horn, Texas and Marfa, Texas rolls out of a pastel sunset.. . . . . . . . . . . . . .@marathonmotel @visitmarathontexas @visitalpinetx @visitfortdavis @marfapublicradio @visitmarfa @visitbigbend @guadalupemountainsnps @visitbigbend #chihuahuandesert #marfatexas #marathontx #fortstockton #fortdavis @junkgypsy #monahanssandhills @txstandard @texastourism @livetexan @texasbootcompany #monahans #amtrak #amtraktrain #sunset #sundown #twilight #goldenhour #goldenhours #sunsetlimitedtrain #sunsetlimited #texaseagle #amtraktexaseagle amtraksunsetlimited

A post shared by Traces of Texas (@traces_of_texas) on Apr 6, 2018 at 3:06pm PDT

If exploring the harsh deserts of the southwest gives you the kicks, the Sunset Limited from New Orleans to Los Angeles is the train for you. The train also stops at national parks along the way.

post_content:
View this post on Instagram

More of SP18 putting on a show. #durangocolorado #durangoandsilvertonnarrowgaugerailroad #colorado #nikond850 #dsngrr #steamtrain #everything_transport #visitdurango #trb_express #trains_worldwide #dodurango #kings_transport #pocket_rail #daily_crossing #coloradolive #coloradophotography #durangotrain #railsofamerica #railsupremacy #mydurangotrainmoment #railways_of_our_world# #slimprincess #sp18 #southernpacific

A post shared by Bryan Burton (@bryanburtonphotographytrains) on Mar 17, 2019 at 1:22pm PDT

The Durango and Silverton Narrow Gauge Railroad lets you witness the diverse landscape in the country. Feel like a timeless traveler with this trip, as the steam engine train goes from the barren deserts to the snow-covered mountains of Colorado.

post_title: Time travel on the Alaskan route
post_content:
View this post on Instagram

Still the coolest train ride I've ever taken🚂🌲 Happy Saturday!

A post shared by Heather ♡ (@heathered.rose) on Jan 25, 2020 at 2:58am PST

The vintage White Pass & Yukon Route trains with oaky interiors run between Skagway, Alaska, and Whitehorse, Canada. Riddled with lakes, mountains, and glaciers, the train trip is worth adding to your bucket list. The trip can also be combined with hikes and overnight camping.

View this post on Instagram

@Amtrak California Zephyr lead by 150 and 151 arrives Colfax in the snow! ❄️❄️❄️ ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 📸Nikon D3500 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #pocket_rail #pocket_rail2 #trb_express #trains_worldwide #rails_of_our_world #railways_of_our_world #railways_of_america #gorailroading #train_nerds #daily_crossing #bnsf_railfanner #nerproster #railmarkable #trainspotting #rfa_theyards #rsa_theyards #rsa_theyards #rla_theyards #jj_theyards #worldoftransit #railsupremacy #everything_transport #diesel_locomotive_shop #the_loco_shop #railfan_features #RailSupremacy #west_coast_rail #trains_featured #midwest_rails #amtrak #californiazephyr

A post shared by Jordan (@placer_rail_photography) on Nov 28, 2019 at 1:39pm PST

One of the most iconic train trips of our country, the California Zephyr crosses numerous terrains, from rocky mountains like the Sierra Nevada to flat plains further. Explore the beautiful vastness by taking the cross-country trip between San Francisco and Chicago.

post_content:
View this post on Instagram

Southbound Amtrak Coast Starlight 11 passes by the Arroyo Hondo Vista Point after meeting Union Pacific’s Officer’s Special with 1111 leading just up the rails at the Gaviota Siding!!! @amtrak #amtrak #amtk55 #coaststarlight #gaviotacoast #passengertrain #daily_crossing #pocket_rail #railsupremacy #railfan_features #pacificocean #afternoon #ipulledoverforthis

A post shared by Tony Evans (@bigtonye69) on May 17, 2020 at 3:55pm PDT

If you wish to travel the entire West Coast in under $100, hop on to the Coast Starlight. This luxurious train showcases the beautiful seacoast between Los Angeles and Seattle in less than 35 hours.

post_content:
View this post on Instagram

Looking for a romantic, yet unique experience for your loved one? Check out Smoky Mountains Railroad “uncorked” Rail Line and Wine experience. It will fuse the adventure of railroading with the love of good wine and good company. About This Trip Passengers will enjoy a full service All-Adult First Class ride in our First Class cars with a private attendant and plush, well-appointed dining seating. A narrator will accompany the ride to present each pour to guests and share knowledge and history of the wines selected. Passengers on this specialty car will enjoy an exclusive sampling of cheeses and a surf and turf meal prepared fresh. We have carefully selected our wine samples to accompany the meal. All passengers will receive a GSMR souvenir stemless wine glass, four samples of selected wine, and a dessert that’s perfect for the season! Uncorked is offered on the Tuckasegee River Excursiondeparting on Feb 15 11AM. Looking for a memorable Valentines evening? Join us for a very special Uncorked on February 14 at 6PM - Sweetheart Valentine Evening Train! This 2 1/2 hour train ride follows the Tuckasegee River Excursion Route and features all the same unique experiences as our day time Uncorked. Tickets for both these experiences are $125 per person (Adults 21+ only). Due to the exclusivity of this specialty car, tickets will be selling fast so make sure to reserve your seat today! For Starters Enjoy a sampling of Havarti, muenster, & Gouda cheeses Soup Fresh Pumpkin Bisque Soup with Toasted Hazelnuts Served with a Warm Dinner Roll Main Course Onion Crusted Atlantic Baked Salmon topped with a Dijon Cream Sauce over a bed of Creamy Mushroom and Spinach. Tender Beef Slices topped with a Port Wine Reduction and Carrot Soufflé. Dessert Vanilla Bean Cheesecake topped with fresh Raspberries #smokymountains #smokies #tnvacation #smokymountainsnationalpark #pigeonforgetn #greatsmokymountainsnationalpark #gsmnp #gatlinburg #tennesseetravel #pigeonforge #gatlinburgtennessee #gatlinburgtn #gatlinburgcabins #cabin2pines #twopinescabin #twopines #railroad #gsmr #greatsmokymountainrailroad #romanticdate #uniqueexperience

A post shared by Two Pines Cabins (@two_pines_smokymountains) on Feb 11, 2020 at 3:19am PST

The Great Smoky Mountains Railroad lets you explore the range through two equally scenic routes. You can either board the one that runs along rivers and over the Fontana lake into the gorge or search the historical route and wind through valleys and small towns.

post_content:
View this post on Instagram

The Grand Canyon railway - what a wonderful way to travel to the Grand Canyon 🚂👌 It’s definitely a “great” train journey with interesting scenery and on-board entertainment. Where else would you get fascinating information about local wildlife, 🦂🐍serenaded by cowboys 🤠and “robbed” by outlaws ..... (who fortunately were then arrested by the sheriff 🤠) whilst travelling to and from one of the worlds great natural wonders? We were lucky enough to have the company of good friends too - a truly memorable day ☺️ . . #transport_tuesday #grandcanyonrailway #grandcanyon #greattrainjourneys #efe_snapshots_travel #total_transport #trainstagram #railroad #pocket_rail #arizona #visitarizona #pocket_usa #usaphotolovers #just_unitedstates #insta_america #icu_usa #loves_united_states #total_americas #raw_usa #grandcanyonnationalpark #visit_arizona #excellent_universe #excellent_america #explore_earth_ #ig_greatshot #beautifuldestinations #ig_great_pics #worlds_beautiful_photos #my_daily_theme #mdt_0786

A post shared by Jan (@janpandrum) on Dec 3, 2019 at 4:49am PST

The Grand Canyon Railway offers the best view of the mystic Grand Canyon in under $100 and four hours. The train leaves from Flagstaff, Arizona, and travels north to the rim of the Canyon. Vintage steam-engine enthusiasts can hop on the train on Saturdays.

post_content:
View this post on Instagram

We know our riders are missing scenic train rides like these. 💙 While we continue to operate a limited schedule, we want to thank those using our service for essential travel for helping to keep fellow riders and employees safe by wearing a face covering while on board trains, buses, and at stations. #CCRiderRepost @coasterfan2105

A post shared by Capitol Corridor (@capitolcorridor) on May 14, 2020 at 9:19am PDT

The Capitol Corridor is a short journeyed train trip that gives you the best view. Running along the coastal city of San Jose, the train travels through the greenlands of Sacramento to the north and stops in San Francisco.

post_content:
View this post on Instagram

@amtrak traveling through Glacier National Park on time with next station being East Glacier in my second home of Montana #empirebuildertrain #railroad #railfanning

A post shared by Harrison Sadler (@amcr2004) on Feb 11, 2020 at 10:05pm PST

Being one of the longest train journeys in the country, the Empire Builder travels between Chicago and Seattle. The highlight of the trip is the 8-hour scenic stretch of Glacier National Park across the Green Plain and a seven-mile tunnel to the Cascade Mountains.

post_content:
View this post on Instagram

"Metroliner Under the George Washington" Amtrak's Metroliner Conference Car, 9800, brings up the markers of Sunday's Amtrak 237 as the train traverses under the George Washington Bridge on the Empire Connection in New York City. 9800 is usually confined to the Northeast Corridor for use on specials and chartered trains, making this special car's trip on the Hudson Line extremely rare. #amtrak #empireconnection #amtrak9800 #metroliner #georgewashingtonbridge #gwb #empireservice #amtrakempireservice #amtrakmetroliner

A post shared by Gregory Grice (@the_gr0g) on Apr 6, 2020 at 9:06am PDT

If you don’t have time on your hand, then the Empire Service is the train trip for you. It is a short train trip between NYC and Albany that rolls through some of the most beautiful landscapes along the Hudson River Valley.

post_content:
View this post on Instagram

Beautiful Alaska

A post shared by Julie, with an e (@julie.boselly) on Jul 23, 2016 at 11:45am PDT

The Alaska Coastal Classic takes you to one of the most scenic routes in the country. The trail winds through dramatic cliffs and mountain ranges that make up Alaska’s entire coastline before terminating at Seward.

post_content:
View this post on Instagram

Chicago to NY with shoreline views: our #LakeShoreLimited train 😍⛵

A post shared by Amtrak (@amtrak) on Jul 31, 2019 at 8:00am PDT

Missing coastal train travel? The Lake Shore Limited is here to save the day. The train runs along the base of Lake Erie and Lake Michigan, passing the Mohawk River. Witness the beauty of the highlands of Berkshires and valleys of the wine country.
